x10.xrx

Class Runtime.MemoryAllocator

  • x10.xrx.Runtime.MemoryAllocator
  • Enclosing class:
    Runtime

    public static class Runtime.MemoryAllocator
    Encapsulates the properties of the different memory allocators available to the program. In addition to a default allocator, the program may be able to use specialized allocators that allocate into a pool of large pages or that support congruent allocation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Runtime.MemoryAllocator DEFAULT_ALLOCATOR
      Field Type: x10.xrx.Runtime.MemoryAllocator{self!=null}

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Boolean congruentAvailable()
      static Boolean hugePagesAvailable()
      static Runtime.MemoryAllocator requestAllocator(Boolean hugePages, Boolean congruent)
      Request a memory allocator with the desired properties, the closest available allocator (which may be the default allocator) will be returned.
      static Runtime.MemoryAllocator requireAllocator(Boolean hugePages, Boolean congruent)
      Acquire a memory allocator with the required properties.

        requestAllocator
        

        public static Runtime.MemoryAllocator requestAllocator(Boolean hugePages,
                                                       Boolean congruent)
        

        Request a memory allocator with the desired properties,
the closest available allocator (which may be the default
allocator) will be returned.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        hugePages - allocate from pool of large pages?
        

        congruent - allocate from congruent memory?
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        requireAllocator
        

        public static Runtime.MemoryAllocator requireAllocator(Boolean hugePages,
                                                       Boolean congruent)
        

        Acquire a memory allocator with the required properties.
If one is not available, an OutOfMemoryError will be thrown.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        hugePages - allocate from pool of large pages?
        

        congruent - allocate from congruent memory?
